mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_INFO1 ( ROOM_NUM, ROOM_TYPE, BUILDING_TYPE, MONTHLY_PAYMENT, MONTHLY_DEPOSIT, JEONSE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ZIPCODE, TRADE_TYPE, MEM_ID ) VALUES ( ROOM_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ROOM_TYPE}, #{BUILDING_TYPE}, #{MONTHLY_PAYMENT}, #{MONTHLY_DEPOSIT}, #{JEONSE}, #{ADDRESS1}, #{ADDRESS2}, #{ZIPCODE}, #{TRADE_TYPE}, #{MEM_ID} )

INSERT INTO ROOM_BOARD ( ROOM_NUM, BOARD_NUM, TRADE_STATUS, EXPIRATION_DATE, HIT_COUNT, FAV_COUNT, DEL_GB, UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{ROOM_NUM}, #{BOARD_NUM}, #{TRADE_STATUS}='광고중', #{EXPIRATION_DATE}, 0, 0, 'N', SYSDATE )
